description:
No stretch, no twists and no clips, this little clothesline is so simple you can set it up indoors or out. With sliding beads to keep your dry-ables in place, it's great to bring if you’re packing light and planning for some hand washing on your travels.

  • Beaded cord design keeps your dry-ables in place and secure
  • Reflective cord helps keep the clothesline seen in low-light
  • Included neoprene storage pouch
  • Packed dimensions: 5 x 7 x 2cm
name: Sea To Summit 3.5m Clothesline
